# <LANGUAGE> Qui Browser Overview Template

## Vision

- Provide a concise translation of the product mission.
- Emphasise Chrome extension support, VR focus, media optimization, and Stripe
  billing.

## Capabilities

- Bullet list of key features mirroring the English master.

## Quick Start

1. Installation command (`npm install`).
2. Environment configuration (`.env`).
3. Server launch (`npm start`).
4. Access instructions tailored to the locale.

## Directory Guide

- Mention `server-lightweight.js`, `utils/stripe-service.js`,
  `extensions/manager.js`, and the `docs/` structure.

## Support & Feedback

- Describe how local users should report issues or request enhancements.
